resources.string:
Terms and Conditions

 By signing up, you agree to all the below terms of service. You understand that this website is purely for entertainment purposes. None of the information or data on this website is to be considered accurate or to be used for determining whether to Speedfly or otherwise at a site. None of the information is meant to assist users in Speedflying.

 1. Accuracy

 Content on this website is user-generated and while we make best efforts to ensure accuracy of information it is not guaranteed. You should not rely on this information and make perform your own checks of it's accuracy.

 2. Good Citizen Policy

 By signing up you agree to represent the community to the best of your ability. Those who take actions that are detrimental to the community will have their accounts revoked.

 3. Real Name Policy

 Information here is submitted by and for a specific community. Users are required to user their real name. Not using a real name will result in being banned. The goal is for people to submit high quality information that we can verify. Part of our verification process is verifying who is submitting information. We cannot do this without a real name.

 4. Content Submissions

 You grant a perpetual, unlimited, non-exclusive license to use content you submit to Speedflyers and in so doing attest that you are the rightful content owner. This is similar to the licensing language used by comparable websites on....
